posts.post_content: Finally a use for a deck running [Dark Maze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Maze) (much better than [Wall Of Wonder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wall Of Wonder) imo). Running this equipment with that wall, the aforementioned Illusionary Wall, maybe [Wall Of Razors](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wall Of Razors) sounds like a good aggro strategy. Weird, but fun.
